archimate:ArchimateDiagramModel.name: Manage Applicant Tagging
archimate:ArchimateDiagramModel.documentation:
Ability to tag an applicant as ineligible for (re)hire Ability to tag an external applicant as "Contact Recruiter Before Considering Applicant" Ability to tag an internal applicant as "Contact HR Before Considering Applicant"
Recruiter will require the ability flag external applicants HRC will require the ability to flag internal applicants
